paragraphs.body: VUDUBERI is a privately owned art studio that deals in a wide range of illustrated materials, commonly working freelance with a number of companies at the same time. They are best known for their character designs created while under the employment of multiple toy and game companies. VUDUBERI was hired shortly after ${link_0} was greenlit to illustrate a majority of the trading cards in the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: VUDUBERI is a privately owned art studio that deals in a wide range of illustrated materials, commonly working freelance with a number of companies at the same time. They are best known for their character designs created while under the employment of multiple toy and game companies. VUDUBERI was hired shortly after Avatar: The Last Airbender was greenlit to illustrate a majority of the trading cards in the Avatar TCG.

paragraphs.body: VUDUBERI has contributed to the creation or artistic design of merchandise for a number of companies, including:
paragraphs.text: VUDUBERI has contributed to the creation or artistic design of merchandise for a number of companies, including:

paragraphs.body: The Puppy in My Pocket figurine collection and its Kitty in My Pocket counterpart
paragraphs.text: The Puppy in My Pocket figurine collection and its Kitty in My Pocket counterpart

paragraphs.body: The Sigma Star Saga character illustrations
paragraphs.text: The Sigma Star Saga character illustrations

paragraphs.body: World of Warcraft and Spiderman novels
paragraphs.text: World of Warcraft and Spiderman novels

paragraphs.body: Illustrations and designs for Gaia Online and Gaia Interactive
paragraphs.text: Illustrations and designs for Gaia Online and Gaia Interactive

paragraphs.body: VUDUBERI credits ${link_0} and a few others as having assisted in the illustration of some unspecified trading cards, though none of the names listed appear on any of the cards.
paragraphs.text: VUDUBERI credits Ryan Odagawa and a few others as having assisted in the illustration of some unspecified trading cards, though none of the names listed appear on any of the cards.
